casebody.data:
FLYNN
v.
SCHAMENS, et al. 451A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 *584C. Kiel Garella, Attorney at Law, for Flynn, Karen W., et al. David W. Schamens, for Schamens, David Wayne, et al. Phillips Wiegand, Jr., Registered Agent/Pro Se, for Invictus Asset Management, LLC, et al. Piliana M. Schamens, Registered Agent/Pro Se, for Tradedesk Financial Group, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of December 2016 by Plaintiff for Sanctions:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
